attributes.action: Get himself  out of downing street until a good prime minister arrives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to remove Gordon Brown Downing Street. Permenantly.
Note, also that I (the person who made this) am 13, and I don't like the way this country is going.Is this the way the country is going, I am ENGLISH!
RULE BRITANNIA!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
